path: artifacts/Little Bunny Rocket Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.LittleBunnyRocket: contracts/Little Bunny Rocket Full Smart Contract Security Audit/LittleBunnyRocket

findings.title: Out of Gas
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is long.
